long_description: An urban steed with a strong frame, the Novara Big Buzz takes control of the city's streets with 27 speeds, all-weather hydraulic disc brakes and sturdy tires. Sturdy aluminum frame offers a responsive, stable and versatile ride for commuting, errands, 'round-town riding and longer jaunts on the weekend. Flat handlebar design provides an upright riding position for improved comfort and visibility. SRAM triple crankset and 9-speed cassette offer wide-ranging gearing to make easy work of hills and keep you spinning on the descents. Quickly shift through the 27 speeds with the SRAM X5 trigger shifters, which guide the X5 derailleurs with snappy precision. Tektro Auriga Pro hydraulic disc brakes provide sure speed management in all weather conditions, from fine-tuning speed to outright, full-power stops. In addition, the Auriga Pro disc brakes use mineral oil in their hydraulic system, which is less toxic than DOT fluid systems and offers lasting performance. Kenda 700c tires offer good all-around performance and feature Kevlar(R) puncture protection, a versatile tread and reflective sidewalls. Platform pedals. Fender and rack mounts (fenders and racks sold separately). Specs on our Novara Big Buzz bike are subject to change.
